title: Multi-modal Masked Siamese Network Improves Chest X-Ray Representation Learning
details: S Shurrab, A Guerra-Manzanares, FE Shamout - arXiv preprint arXiv:2407.04449, 2024
abstract: Self-supervised learning methods for medical images primarily rely on the imaging modality during pretraining. While such approaches deliver promising results, they do not leverage associated patient or scan information collected within Electronic …

title: Optimization of vision transformer-based detection of lung diseases from chest X-ray images
details: J Ko, S Park, HG Woo - BMC Medical Informatics and Decision Making, 2024
abstract: Recent advances in Vision Transformer (ViT)-based deep learning have significantly improved the accuracy of lung disease prediction from chest X-ray images. However, limited research exists on comparing the effectiveness of different optimizers for lung …
